remarks: The addition operation of the multivariate power series structure. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Dec-2014.)
statement:
psrplusg.s $e |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) $.
psrplusg.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
psrplusg.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) $.
psrplusg.p $e |- .+b = ( +g ` S ) $.
psradd.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
psradd.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
psradd $p |- ( ph -> ( X .+b Y ) = ( X oF .+ Y ) ) $.
